inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: class IIa, positive anti-AChR antibody test, single fiber electromyography (SFEMG) was positive

inclusion.criterion: pyridostigmine 60 mg three times a day
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: has some symptoms that interfere with her job

exclusion.criterion: parents/guardian are not willing to give consent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 35-year-old woman with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
